meaningMnemonic: If you have the <kanji>leadership</kanji> <kanji>spirit</kanji> it means you have a lot of <vocabulary>ambition</vocabulary> to go after the things you want. And you'll be able to lead others because of it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
